data:
Ek samay ki baat hai, ek chalak aur tezi se bhagne wala fox tha. Vah bahut hi chalak aur buddhimani tha, aur vah hamesha apne shikaar ka shikaar karne ke liye nayi chal chalta tha.

Ek din, fox ne ek ped ke neeche baithi ek budhiya dekhi. Vah budhiya apni aankhon mein dhuni mein baithi thi aur apne haathon mein ek chhota sa bag tha. Fox ne socha ki vah budhiya shayad kuchh khaas cheez rakhti hai us bag mein, aur vah us bag ko churane ka faisla karta hai.

Fox ne budhiya ke paas jaane ki koshish ki, lekin vah bahut hi chaukas thi. Vah fox ko dekhti hi samjh gayi ki vah uska shikaar karne aaya hai. Isliye, vah apne bag ko apne haathon mein kasa kar leti hai aur fox se kehti hai, "Main tumhein nahin doongi mera bag, tum chalak ho, lekin main tumse bhi zyada chalaki hoon."

Fox ne budhiya se kaha, "Main tumhein nahin churaoonga, main tumhari madad karne aaya hoon." Budhiya ne fox ko dekha aur kaha, "Main tum par bharosa nahin kar sakti, tum to chalak ho." Fox ne phir se kaha, "Main tumhari madad karne aaya hoon, main tumhare liye ek uphaar laya hoon."

Budhiya ne socha ki fox sach mein uski madad karne aaya hai, isliye vah uske saath chalne ke liye taiyar ho gayi. Jab vah dono jane lage, to fox ne budhiya se kaha, "Main tumhein ek sundar jagah par le jaoonga, jahan tumhein bahut si cheezein milengi." Budhiya ne socha ki vah sahi jagah par aa gayi hai aur vah fox ke saath chalne lage.

Lekin, jab vah dono ek ped ke neeche pahunche, to fox ne budhiya ko dekha aur kaha, "Main tumhein churane aaya tha, tumhari budhimaayi ne mujhe hara diya." Budhiya ne fox ko dekha aur kaha, "Main tumhein hara diya, lekin main tumhein ek sabak sikhana chahti hoon."

Fox ne budhiya se kaha, "Main tumhari baat sunne ke liye taiyar hoon." Budhiya ne kaha, "Chalak hona theek hai, lekin budhimaayi hona zyada accha hai. Agar tum budhimaan hote, to tumhein pata chalta ki main tumse zyada chalaki hoon."

Fox ne budhiya ki baat suni aur vah samajh gaya ki vah galat tha. Vah budhiya se maafi maangi aur phir se budhiya ke saath dosti karne laga. Is tarah, fox ne ek mahatvapoorna sabak seekha ki chalak hona theek hai, lekin budhimaayi hona zyada accha hai.

Is kahani se humein yah sikhaaya jaata hai ki budhimaayi hona chalak hone se zyada accha hai, kyunki vah humein jivan ke kathin samay mein sahi faisla lene mein madad karti hai.
